Introduction

ROLIGHTS (Korean: 롤라이트스), also known as SHOT GIRL (샷걸), is a South Korean rock band with four female members: Hye Won, Da Eun, Hye Rim & Ha Ran.

They debuted on July 18, 2019, with the single “The End“. On February 13, 2023, they announced that they changed their name to ROLIGHTS.
